About Me

I'm a self-taught Web Developer, with knowledge and understanding of the way full stack wep apps are created.

work in a team setting. The passion I have for learning new web technolgies and frameworks, that builds on
my foundation of skills that helps me stay up to date with latests trends in Web Development.
